dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Lose 5 SP on Clash Lose. Gain 1 [Agility] next turn when hit (max 2)
dataList.panicDescription: Gain 2 [Vulnerable]. Gain 1 [Agility] next turn when hit (max 3)

dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Clash Power -1 on self. Deal +10% more damage on Heads Hit
